dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1956
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Graphic description of a visit to a prisoner on death row and other stories of terrible deaths in their neighborhood. Asks "Where to lay the blame?" Lashes out against "this rotten, decadent, putrid industrial capitalist system" calling for building up all forms of mutual aid.
